hi! welcome to my website :D

i'm stephanie wan, a junior at lexington high school.

loves: CS (competitive programming, AI, cybersecurity), science, math, history, philosophy, and art.

at school, i'm the captain of the lexmacs (lexington mathematical computer science) and science olympiad clubs (2nd at states, i have 19 medals :D). i'm also the head coach for the jonas clarke middle school science olympiad club (3x state champion streak!)
